title: GTA 4 / Grand Theft Auto IV in style V [v.5] RePack
description:
GTA 4 / Grand Theft Auto IV in style V [v.5] (Rockstar Games)

Release Date :  2014                           
Crack: ((Razor1911)                              Genre: Action, Shooter, Racing
Language text: Russian, English, Spanish, French
Language voice: English

This mod makes the game its functions similar to GTA 5. replaced with characters of the original game Grand Theft Auto IV with the protagonist Niko Bellic (his skin replaces Michael De Santa), added military equipment, weapons and modified cars will feel the part of the atmosphere, which is present in GTA 5.

The very plot of the game remains the same as the original Grand Theft Auto IV ... Liberty City - a city of infinite possibilities, but for those who are deprived of power and money, the reality is far from a dream. In the harsh world laws determine who is stronger - crooks, thieves, perverts. And for everyone who got in criminal networks, there can be only one solution: adapt or perish ...

Features:
Model Niko Bellic skin replaces Michael De Santa.
Replaced some voice sounds Nico in extreme situations to the voice of Michael De Santa GTA V.
Replaced all cars on GTA IV cars of GTA V (in the game of more than 80 units).
Replaced all the radio stations in the GTA IV of GTA V.
Replaced all models of weapons on the model of GTA V.
Sounds of weapons taken from GTA V.
Changed on realistic physics weapons.
Minimap replaced the style GTA V.
Changed a font style GTA V.
Added: Tank (Rhino), P-996 Lazer, Buzzard, JB700.
Added first-person view while in the car (the car can rotate his head).
Added modes blood Exaggerated blood v1.16.
Added the dial radio-style GTA V.
Added weapon selection wheel in the style of GTA V.

Features RePack:
At the heart of the English edition of the original game.
Sewn modification: in Style GTA V.
Mod authors: JulioNIB, Ac.Amir, II Macc II, AlexandeRR, JohnMc.
Build version: 5.0.
Tablet: Razor1911
Built otvyazka XLiveless 0.999.B7, ie no need to install Games for Windows LIVE to run the game.
Data compression: lossless.
Author repack: JohnMc
